briefTitle: Effectiveness of a Decision Support System in Improving the Diagnosis and Screening Rate of Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effectiveness of a Decision Support System in Improving the Diagnosis and Screening Rate of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Number of participants with new Breast Neoplasms Diagnosis (Incident cases)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Women between 50 and 69 years old

Exclusion Criteria:

* Breast Neoplasms
* Bilateral mastectomy
* Disabled Persons
